title: Hell or High Water
actors: Chris Pine, Ben Foster, Jeff Bridges
plot: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their fami...
